about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of a determined reporter who arrives at the notorious Hotel 77 in Arkham, Massachusetts, on the fateful night of Monday, July 7th, 1997. You're here to document the 120th anniversary celebration of the hotel, but what you encounter is far from festive.

As midnight strikes, you begin your recording, only to find the hotel eerily deserted. The once bustling corridors now stretch into an endless maze, trapping you in a sinister loop where time stands still. Each passageway seems familiar, yet subtly different, as you navigate the hotel’s repeating corridors, fighting to maintain your sanity.

Amidst the disorienting labyrinth, you stumble upon a cryptic message left at the reception. This mysterious note hints at a way to break free from the hotel’s eldritch grip:

"There are eldritch anomalies in the hotel corridor. If you find an anomaly, turn back and advance in the opposite direction. If there are no anomalies, keep moving forward. The reception is devoid of anomalies. Every successful pass through the reception advances time by one hour. Reach the seventh hour to escape the loop!"

Can you decipher the clues, overcome the anomalies, and survive the nightmarish reality of Hotel 77? Test your wits and bravery in this chilling horror experience.

Play Time

15-60 minutes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You are trapped in an endless lovecraftian hotel. Observe your surroundings and avoid eldritch anomalies in order to reach the exit.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
